description: Support to Decentralization & Local Goverance for Service Delivery Preparatory Phase.

subproject.corporate outcome: National, regional and local levels of governance expand their capacities to manage the equitable delivery of public services
subproject.description:
1.Framework, legislation and policies for decentralisation and local governance developed through multi-stakeholder process
2.Generic systems in policy-making, participatory planning and budgeting, data collection, human resources management and organizational management developed and core competencies of decentralized governance stakeholders improved in select governorates
3. GoI has improved capacities to provide citizens with e-services  in pilot sectors
4.Vertical and horizontal inter-government relations formalized with discussion forums in place and partnerships with international/regional municipalities created in select governorates
subproject.title: Support to Decentralisation

subproject.corporate outcome: Strengthened national-, regional- and local-level capacity to implement anti-corruption initiatives
